sentence: The musical debuted in San Diego at the Old Globe Theatre in 1986 and premiered on Broadway on November 5, 1987, where it won several Tony Award s, including Tony Award for Best Original Score, Tony Award for Best Book of a Musical, and Best Actress in a Musical (Joanna Gleason), in a year dominated by The Phantom of the Opera (1988).
